name: k-fastify-gateway
description: A Node.js API Gateway that just works!

scripts.bench-pm2: ( pm2 start benchmark/service.js -i 4 && pm2 start benchmark/gateway.js -i 4 & (sleep 5 && wrk -t8 -c8 -d30s http://127.0.0.1:8080/service/hi && pm2 delete all) )
scripts.bench: ( node benchmark/service.js & node benchmark/gateway.js & (sleep 5 && wrk -t8 -c8 -d30s http://127.0.0.1:8080/service/hi) )

author: Rolando Santamaria Maso <kyberneees@gmail.com>
